attributes.additional_details:
• 17.5 billion pieces of junk mail are distributed each year in the UK, the average household receives 650 pieces. The majority remains unopened and/or unread.
 • Direct Mail results in roughly 550,000 tons of household waste, 2.1% of the municipal waste stream. 

Junk mail wastes material & energy during every stage of its life cycle (Manufacture, Distribution, Collection, Recycling). This petition calls upon the Government to put the Environment before the Economy.
attributes.background: This petition asserts that unsolicited physical mail, for the purpose of marketing, is unacceptably wasteful & damaging to the environment. This mail (‘Junk Mail’) is delivered to households either through the postal system, or as inserts within other deliveries (such as Newspapers).
